name: Lights Out (itch) (Escada Games)
description:
Lights out... Guess who's gotta fix it?

 Lights Out is a minimalist platformer with primitive lighting under the limitations of the Nokia 3310. Made for the Nokia 3310 Jam #4.

 Controls:
  • Arrow keys: move;
  • X: shoot;
  • Z/C: ???
Credits/Software used:
  • Godot Engine v3.4.2;
  • Krasno's Nokia Soundfont. Obtained via the Nokia 3310 resources;
  • LMMS;

I hope you enjoy playing Lights Out!
